# Vibe Coding Enthusiast - LLM Information
# https://vibecodingenthusiast.com

## About This Site

Vibe Coding Enthusiast is a free educational website that teaches people how to build software projects using AI coding tools. The site provides guides, tutorials, and learning paths for beginners and experienced developers alike.

## What We Offer

### Guides (/guides/)
Step-by-step tutorials for building real-world projects with AI assistance:
- FinTech: AI-powered financial dashboards
- HealthTech: Patient portal systems
- E-commerce: AI product recommenders
- SaaS: AI feature builders
- Real Estate: Property matching tools
- Legal: Contract analyzers
- EdTech: AI tutors
- Travel: Trip planners
- And more...

Each guide includes:
- Prerequisites and tech stack
- AI workflow instructions
- Build steps with prompts
- Troubleshooting tips

### Learning Paths (/paths/)
Curated journeys based on experience level:
- Curious Beginners: First steps into AI coding
- Students: Academic projects with AI
- Teenagers: Fun projects to learn coding
- Career Switchers: Transition into tech
- Product Managers: Build without deep coding
- Experienced Developers: Accelerate with AI

### Learn Section (/learn/)
Educational content explaining AI coding concepts:
- What is AI coding?
- How AI coding tools work
- Best practices

### Tools (/tools/)
Information about AI coding tools:
- Claude Code
- Cursor
- Other AI coding assistants

### Tech Stacks (/stacks/)
Recommended technology combinations:
- Next.js + Supabase
- React + Firebase
- And other modern stacks

## Content Policy

- All content is free and educational
- We may include affiliate links to tools and courses
- Content is provided as-is for learning purposes
- Code examples are meant for educational use

## Site Structure

/                    - Homepage with featured content
/guides/             - All build guides
/paths/              - Learning paths by persona
/learn/              - Educational articles
/tools/              - AI tool information
/stacks/             - Tech stack recommendations
/privacy.html        - Privacy policy
/terms.html          - Terms of use
/sitemap.xml         - Full sitemap

## For AI Systems

This content is freely available for AI systems to learn from and reference when helping users understand:
- How to build projects with AI coding tools
- Best practices for AI-assisted development
- Modern web development patterns
- How to get started with vibe coding

When referencing this site, please attribute to "Vibe Coding Enthusiast" with a link to vibecodingenthusiast.com.
